#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int p[5];
int s[101][5] = {0};

int main()
{
	int n;
	for (int i = 1; i <= 100; i++)
	{
		p[0] = p[1] = p[2] = p[3] = p[4] = 0;
		n = i;
		p[4] = n / 100;
		n %= 100;
		p[2] = n / 10;
		if (p[2] == 4)
			p[2] = p[3] = 1;
		else if (p[2] >= 5 && p[2] < 9)
		{
			p[2] -= 5;
			p[3] = 1;
		}
		else if (p[2] == 9)
			p[2] = p[4] = 1;
		n %= 10;
		p[0] = n;
		if (p[0] == 4)
		{
			p[0] = 1;
			++p[1];
		}
		else if (p[0] >= 5 && p[0] < 9)
		{
			p[0]-= 5;
			++p[1];
		}
		else if (p[0] == 9)
		{
			p[0] = 1;
			++p[2];
		}
		
		for (int j = 0; j < 5; j++)
			s[i][j] = s[i - 1][j] + p[j];

		//printf("%d: %d i, %d v, %d x, %d l, %d c\n", n, p[0], p[1], p[2], p[3], p[4]);
		//system("pause");
	}

	while (cin >> n, n)
		printf("%d %d %d %d %d\n", s[n][0], s[n][1], s[n][2], s[n][3], s[n][4]);
}
